DOC.brief_summary: In this study, the investigators are interested in evaluating the impact of an orthopaedic related smoking cessation discussion after fracture surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Surgeon-Patient Communication: A Randomized Controlled Trial Evaluating the Impact of an Orthopaedic Related Smoking Cessation Discussion After Fracture Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year old or older, daily smoker inpatient post fracture operation, patient that have never received an orthopaedic related smoking cessation discussion Younger than 18, patients unable to provide consent patients that suffer from auditory/visual/mental disability requiring another individual as a decisionmaker
